roles.name: Altruist
roles.description: You may choose ONE person to bring back from the dead
roles.text: You may only do this ONCE per game

roles.name: Clairvoyant
roles.description: You may see the role of a dead player

roles.name: Cupid
roles.description: Choose two players. If one dies, so will the other

roles.name: Detective
roles.description: Choose another player, you will be able to see if they are part of the Mafia
roles.text: Note: The Mafia Boss cannot be detected, while the Tanner will be a FALSE POSITIVE

roles.name: Doppelganger
roles.description: Choose another player, you are now that role.

roles.name: Gambler
roles.description: Choose a player you think will survive. You won't die until they do

roles.name: Guardian Angel
roles.description: Choose another player to give them an EXTRA LIFE

roles.name: Investigator
roles.description: You may see the role of ONE player (Living or Dead).
roles.text: You may only do this ONCE per game

roles.name: Mafia
roles.adminInfo: Wake up the Mafia Boss too

roles.name: Mafia Boss
roles.description: A Mafia that cannot be detected

roles.name: Mayor
roles.description: Get TWO votes during the trial and the tie breaker

roles.name: Sniper
roles.description: Kill ONE player at any point
roles.text: Note: The doctor cannot save them

roles.name: Tanner
roles.description: Win the game by getting voted as Mafia during the Trial

roles.name: Taxi Driver
roles.text:
Note: If a Mafia is selected, they will have a chance to fail their action based on how many other Mafia are present
If the player could only do their action once per game they will be able to do it again on the next night.

roles.name: Thing
roles.description: Poke the player on your RIGHT or LEFT
roles.text: You may only do this ONCE per game

roles.name: Villager
roles.text: Note: You literally don't do anything else
